Forms






Office of Admissions Forms
Residency Forms​ and Information 
	The following forms are used when making residency determinations. For information regarding how residency is determined, please visit SSU's Records residency page​​ and The California State University's Residency page. **It's recommended that you first download/save the PDF form to your computer or network drive, and then open it with Adobe Reader and fill it.

		CSU Residence Questionnaire 
California Nonresident Tuition Exemption Request (AB540)


Application form for Cross Enrollment, Early Entrant, Teacher Diversity form and Work related form
	Cross Enrollment form
Work related form


Application Fee Waiver Appeal: The appeal form should be used for fee waiver appeals and for applicants that qualify for Alan Pattee, California Veteran Dependents and Dependents of 9/11/2001 fee waivers​. The form should be emailed to appeals@sonoma.edu. Application Fee Waiver Appeals must be submitted prior to the application deadline as the submission of the appeal will not extend the application deadline.  The application fee once paid will not be reimbursed.
2023-2024 Undergraduate Application Fee Waiver Appeal
Application Fee Waiver Checklist

International Students will have to submit following documents to show sufficient funds to cover their educational expenses:
	Financial Affidavit (Certificate of Financial Support)
A bank statement from you and/or sponsor
